rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0001
rows.name: So the emperor isn't here...

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0002
rows.name:
What a shame.
You were hoping to see him
after so long, weren't you?

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0003
rows.name:
I don't feel like
it's been a long time at all,
but I did want to meet him.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0004
rows.name:
In the past, you would stand
by that throne over there...

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0005
rows.name: Quiet, and resolved.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0006
rows.name:
You may say that, but
I don't feel any sense of familiarity...

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0007
rows.name:
I had hoped some sense of it might
remain, but it seems to be completely
wiped away.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0008
rows.name: That appears to be the case...

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0009
rows.name:
Unlike you, Kagutsuchi,
I haven't read any records of the past.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0010
rows.name:
Without any data, it is difficult to feel
any emotional connection either.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0011
rows.name:
Besides, you're currently
prohibited from reading any past records.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0012
rows.name: Yes, that's true...

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0013
rows.name:
I have no idea what I was doing until
recently, nor what my responsibilities
are in the Superbian Empire.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0014
rows.name:
I've learned some things from you and
Meleph, but I likely don't understand
my true purpose.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0015
rows.name:
That's why I had hoped to ask Emperor
Nefer why he forbade me from
accessing my past records.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0016
rows.name: What do you think might be the reason?

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0017
rows.name: Let me see...

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0018
rows.name:
Why won't the emperor let
Wadatsumi read the records?

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0019
rows.name: He wanted to demote me.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0020
rows.name:
He wants me to safeguard the world,
not just the empire.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0101
rows.name:
From what I've heard, I failed
to protect the emperor, didn't I?

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0102
rows.name:
If that's the case, perhaps it means
I've been relieved of my duty
as the emperor's protector?

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0103
rows.name: You're being too negative...

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0104
rows.name: Wadatsumi, you're too serious by nature.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0105
rows.name:
In my opinion, His Majesty wanted you
to protect Alst
rather than just himself.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0106
rows.name:
Rather than confining someone of your
caliber to Superbia alone...

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0107
rows.name:
He thought to have you contribute
to making the world a better place.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0108
rows.name: I see...

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0109
rows.name:
He thought that
knowing my role in Superbia
would only hold me back.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0110
rows.name: Probably.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0201
rows.name: This might be presumptuous of me, but...

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0202
rows.name:
Perhaps the emperor believed
I should serve the world of Alst
rather than just the empire?

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0203
rows.name:
You mean, that a skilled Blade
should safeguard the world rather
than just one nation?

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0204
rows.name: That's right.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0205
rows.name: You're quite confident, aren't you?

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0206
rows.name: I thought so myself.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0207
rows.name: But I do think you're right.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0208
rows.name:
That's why the Emperor is keeping
your role in Superbia from you.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0209
rows.name:
He worried that such knowledge
might hold you back.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0301
rows.name: I see...

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0302
rows.name:
I wasn't able to meet the emperor,
but our conversation, Kagutsuchi,
has strengthened my resolve.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0303
rows.name: That's good to hear...

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0304
rows.name:
I personally hope you can return
to His Majesty's side as quickly
as possible.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0305
rows.name: Are you worried after all?

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0306
rows.name: Of course I am.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0307
rows.name:
Anyone can assist with His Majesty's
 administrative duties, but his
protection requires your strength.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0308
rows.name:
Until now, both Meleph-sama and I
felt secure because you were protecting
His Majesty.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0309
rows.name:
Certainly...
The sooner things fall back into place,
the better.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0310
rows.name:
When all is said and done, I will
return to the throne room...

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0311
rows.name:
Together, Kagutsuchi,
let's resolve this situation with our
combined strength.

rows.label: kizunatalk055_msg0312
rows.name:
Yes...
I'm counting on you.
